Plot: This is the story of Uxbal, a man living in this world, but able to see his death, which guides his every move.
Title: Biutiful
Writer: Alejandro González Iñárritu (screenplay), Alejandro González Iñárritu (based on a story by), Nicolás Giacobone (screenplay), Armando Bo (screenplay)
Actors: Javier Bardem, Maricel Álvarez, Hanaa Bouchaib, Guillermo Estrella
tomatoConsensus: Javier Bardem's searing performance helps to elevate Biutiful, as does Alejandro González Iñárritu's craftsmanship, but the film often lapses into contrivance and grimness.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 45 nominations.
